message: The SDG_TARGET field for indicator 3-5-1, translated into all languages

data.en: Target 3.5: Strengthen the prevention and treatment of substance abuse, including narcotic drug abuse and harmful use of alcohol
data.fr: Cible 3.5 : Renforcer la prévention et le traitement de la toxicomanie (abus de substances psychoactives), notamment l'abus de stupéfiants et la consommation nocive d’alcool
